DSL

This examples shows how to create a diagram using the UmlCanvas DSL. 

  
Diagram myDiagram +dynamic {
  [@22,19]
  interface Interface1 +stereotype="base" {
    +protected operation op1 : Int;
  }

  [@37,150]
  class SubClass1 : Interface1 +stereotype="sub" {
     +private attribute attr1 : String;
     +protected operation op1 : Int {
      parameter param1 : String;
    }
  }

  [@329,19]
  class BaseClass1 +abstract {
    +protected +abstract operation op1 : Int;
  }
  
  [@470, 250]
  note BaseClass1Note 
    +text="This is BaseClass1.\nIt has a reference to Interface1,\nwhich executes the op1 method for BaseClass1."
    +linkedTo="BaseClass1,Interface1";

  [@320,150]
  class SubClass2 : BaseClass1 {
    +private attribute attr1 : String;
    +protected operation op1 : Int {
      parameter param1 : String;
    }
  }

  [@vertical]
  association myInterface1s {
    +composite role baseclass : BaseClass1;
    +navigable role interface : Interface1;
  }

  [@vertical]
  dependency mySubClasses1 {
    client subclass : SubClass2;
    supplier othersubclass : SubClass1;
  }
}
